mapper.select: SELECT w.weekly_report_id, w.report_date, w.confirmed_flg, u.user_id AS my_user_id, u.user_number AS my_user_number, u.user_name AS my_user_name FROM weekly_reports w INNER JOIN users u ON w.user_id = u.user_id INNER JOIN projects p ON w.project_id = p.project_id WHERE w.confirmed_flg = '0' AND p.deleted_flg = '0' ORDER BY u.user_number, w.weekly_report_id, w.report_date DESC
